Susan Breshears Bayh (born November 28, 1959) is an American lawyer. She is known as the wife of Evan Bayh, former Democratic Governor of Indiana (1989–1997) and United States Senator (1999–2011).
Bayh began her careers in law and business with Gibson, Dunn, & Crutcher; and later for the Indiana firm of Barnes & Thornburg. In 1989, she joined Eli Lilly and Company. In 1994, she left the employ of Eli Lilly and taught at Butler University’s College of Business Administration.
In May 2018, Bayh had surgery to remove a malignant glioblastoma tumor.
